<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DropCursorExtensionOptions extends BaseExtensionOptions
```

|  [blockWidth](./extension-drop-cursor.dropcursorextensionoptions.blockwidth.md) | <code>string &#124; number</code> | The width of the block drop cursor. |

|  [inlineWidth](./extension-drop-cursor.dropcursorextensionoptions.inlinewidth.md) | <code>string &#124; number</code> | The width of the inline drop cursor. |
